title: Startups Incubated at Nasscom AI Center of Excellence
description: Complete list of 18 deep-tech startups incubated and supported by the Nasscom AI Center of Excellence (CoE)

startups.name: Atomo Innovation
startups.description: Indigenous, AI-powered edge computing hardware built for real-time industrial automation. Low power, scalable, interoperable, and made for harsh industrial environments.

startups.name: Bigdatamatica Solutions
startups.description: An AI driven multi-agent platform to automate support, streamline search, and enable faster, cost-effective decision making.

startups.name: BioLex Advisory
startups.description: Catalyst for genome-edited agri-tech, bridging science, policy, and law for responsible innovation.

startups.name: Bipolar Factory
startups.description: AI-powered video intelligence that transforms CCTV networks into real-time, actionable insight platforms

startups.name: CogniFirst Technologies

startups.name: DocYantra

startups.name: HanuAI

startups.name: Ignited Wings Technologies (AI LifeBOT)

startups.name: Upjao Agrotech
